1 The figures over the years 1994 – 2001 have 
only been adjusted for the change in accounting 
for capital gains and losses on shares and real 
estate. 
2 Liabilities are EUR 238,5 billion and embedded 
value amounted to EUR 17.6 billion as per the end 
of 2004. Please refer to the AEGON Annual Report 
2004 on www.aegon.com for the full financial 
statements. 
2.2 Report scope 
Divergence does exist between markets, countries and cultures. AEGON country units, however, 
subscribe to a common set of guidelines and 
principles. This Corporate Responsibility Report 
covers the major country units and all product and 
service lines. Financial information and information 
on the number of employees are the same as in the 
AEGON Annual Report 2004. This report has been coordinated by the Group Corporate Responsibility 
department. We invite you to share your opinion 
on AEGON’s corporate responsibility ambitions and 
reporting (e-mail: response@aegon.com ). 
AEGON Corporate Responsibility Report 2004 5
